mapper.select: select PACKAGE_NO as no, PACKAGE_NAME as name, PACKAGE_DISCOUNTED_PRICE as discountedPrice, PACKAGE_ORIGINAL_PRICE as originalPrice, PACKAGE_IMAGE as imagePath, PACKAGE_COMPOSITION as composition from MGV_PACKAGE order by PACKAGE_NO ASC

select PACKAGE_NO as no, PACKAGE_NAME as name, PACKAGE_DISCOUNTED_PRICE as discountedPrice, PACKAGE_ORIGINAL_PRICE as originalPrice, PACKAGE_IMAGE as imagePath, PACKAGE_COMPOSITION as composition from MGV_PACKAGE where PACKAGE_NO = #{value}

select A.PACKAGE_NO as no, A.PACKAGE_NAME as name, A.PACKAGE_DISCOUNTED_PRICE as discountedPrice, A.PACKAGE_ORIGINAL_PRICE as originalPrice, A.PACKAGE_IMAGE as imagePath, A.PACKAGE_COMPOSITION as composition, B.CAT_NO as "category.no" from MGV_PACKAGE A, MGV_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B where A.CAT_NO = #{value} and A.CAT_NO = B.CAT_NO
